original_text: Perhaps a man has sex parts that someone has destroyed or spoiled. That man cannot join with the Lord's people when they meet together.
korean_text: 고환이 상한 자나 음경이 잘린 자는 여호와의 총회에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Perhaps a man has sex parts
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 어떤 남자가 성기가 있을 수 있는데

sentences.original_text: that someone has destroyed or spoiled
